name: Rally Drive Simulator
description:
Rally Drive Simulator is a physics engine rally car game.

If you like Simulator Games, drifting, crushing and rally try it.
Smooth controls, realistic auto physics.
Test your real drift skills.

***FEATURES***

* Easy controllers
* Realistic driving experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* Tablet support and FULL HD support
* FULL HD graphics with high quality
